resources.string: This is the Home Fragment demonstrating the Navigation Component with BottomNavigationView. You can navigate between Home, Profile, and Settings using the bottom navigation menu.

This is the Info tab inside the Profile Fragment. It demonstrates nested navigation using ViewPager2 and TabLayout. The InfoFragment and GalleryFragment are child fragments managed by a FragmentStateAdapter (ProfilePagerAdapter).
This is the Gallery tab inside the Profile Fragment. ViewPager2 allows smooth swiping between these nested fragments, while TabLayoutMediator automatically syncs the TabLayout with the ViewPager2.
This is the Settings Fragment. All three top-level fragments (Home, Profile, Settings) are managed by a single NavHostFragment using the Navigation Component architecture.
